item.title: Delve version is too low to be compatible with Goland
item.author: wzdushu@gmail.com (wanzi)
item.description: Problem When debugging code in Goland recently, the following error is always reported: Copy 1 WARNING: undefined behavior - version of Delve is too old for Go version 1.19.3 (maximum supported version 1.18) Solution The problem probably means that the Delve version is too low and cannot meet the current Golang version Update delve. Since I use brew to install it here, the default official website installation document does not
